summary:
This is my first modification for Skyrim!
Please "VOTE" for me if you like this mod!
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3710916/?][IMG]http://i.epvpimg.com/F910b.png[/IMG][/URL]

Download it with NMM and start the game!

Dragonbone Bow ID: 020176f1
Press "^" and enter the command --> player.additem 020176f1 1 :D

Please "VOTE" for me if you like this mod!

My other Mods: Dragonbone Arrow Retexture -RED- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49786/?

I hope you like it! :)
author: Skillmaster
